column5: For those of you who have booked with Caesar's lodge, be aware that they have closed down.

I'm assuming it's the lodge only that's closed? Is Caesar's North Camps (Oliver and John) still operating? just curious  I'm guessing with the recession, low $US and high gas prices, some outfitters are going to be feeling the pinch
funny their website says nothing... hopefully they are honest folk.
Only 2nd post since joining in September 2009?
They are separate outfitters. Caesar's lodge is closed, Caesar's North camps are still open.
